title: Foundation & Vision
description: World Blazing Computer Solution was founded in Hadapsar, Pune with a vision to provide practical, job-oriented IT education. Located at Aru Palace Building, Malwadi Road, near Laxmi Mata Mandir, we began our journey with a strong focus on fundamentals and student success.

title: Growing Demand, Growing Team
description: With increasing student trust, we expanded batches, upgraded lab infrastructure, and introduced courses like Tally, MS Office, and Basic Programming. This year established our reputation for student-first teaching.

title: Online Learning Revolution
description: During the pandemic, we transitioned fully to online learning, enabling students to continue their education from anywhere. This helped us reach learners beyond Hadapsar and support hundreds during uncertain times.

title: Introducing Modern IT Skills
description: To align with industry needs, we launched advanced programs including Python Programming, Full Stack Web Development, and Data Science & Analyticsâ€”transforming World Blazing into a career-focused IT training institute.

title: Upgrading Infrastructure & Learning Experience
description: We enhanced classrooms, teaching methodology, and adopted modern tools. With more practical sessions, real-world projects, and one-on-one mentoring, students began progressing faster than ever.

title: Expanding Courses & Placement Support
description: Structured programs were launched across multiple domains along with stronger placement guidance including resume building, mock interviews, and career counseling.

title: Serving the Next Generation
description: Today, World Blazing proudly serves students, job seekers, and professionals across Pune and beyond, recognized for quality training, flexibility, and strong student trust.
